modalInit.title: Welcome to Entertainment!
modalInit.content: Hello, I am Alexander. I am a beginner developer. I developed this application to keep track of everything I watch or play. Any suggestions are welcome!
modalInit.thanks: Thank you for downloading my app and enjoy it! ðŸ’—ðŸ’—
modalInit.moreInfoDescription: If you enjoy this application, please consider supporting my work by sharing it with your friends and family :D

ios.iosTitle: Why is it not available for the App Store?
ios.iosDescription: Our app isnâ€™t available on the App Store because publishing there requires a high annual fee for developer accounts, Thefore, we welcome all contributions.
ios.iosDownloadDescription: However, you can still download and install the app directly from here!
